mapper.sql: id, user_name, pass_word, head_portrait_id, phone_number, birthday, gender, emotion, signature, background, hometown, occupation, school, jurisdiction, addition, remarks, create_date, update_date, del_flag
mapper.insert: insert into shanduo_user (id, user_name, pass_word, head_portrait_id, phone_number, birthday, gender, emotion, signature, background, hometown, occupation, school, jurisdiction, addition, remarks, create_date, update_date, del_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headPortraitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{emotion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hometown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jurisdiction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addition,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR})

user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update shanduo_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_word = #{passWord,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_portrait_id = #{headPortraitId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=CHAR}, emotion = #{emotion,jdbcType=CHAR}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, background = #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hometown = #{hometown,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, occupation = #{occupation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jurisdiction = #{jurisdiction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, addition = #{addition,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

mapper.select: select id as userId, user_name as name, head_portrait_id as picture, birthday as age, gender, signature, hometown from shanduo_user where id like "%"#{query}"%" or user_name like "%"#{query}"%" or phone_number = #{query} limit 10

select id as userId, user_name as name, head_portrait_id as picture, birthday as age, gender, signature from shanduo_user where id in (select attention from user_attention where user_id = #{0} and attention_type = '1') and (id like "%"#{1}"%" or user_name like "%"#{1}"%" or phone_number = #{1}) limit 10
select id as userId, user_name as name,head_portrait_id as picture, birthday as age , gender from shanduo_user where id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
